question: You were on a pleasant trip and had rented a flat from a friend who was on an official tour. Write a letter to your friend how you felt about the trip and how you took care of his house in his absence.
text: Hi, hope you are in the best of  health and spirits and writing this piece of paper to share my experience at your apartment during my trip to Shimla .

As you know , since my childhood I am fond of travelling in hilly areas so vacations spent in Shimla filled my heart with extreme joy. It was pleasant to see the snowfall along with beautiful scenic views. I participated in adventures activities and also clicked ample photographs to capture  unforgettable memories. luckily I chose the winter season for the visit. Since tourists prefer it at this time we can enjoy it  a lot due to the pleasant weather and crowd.

I feel grateful to you for letting me  stay at your home. I am sure you would have definitely gone with me if your official tour did not conflict with my visit . Anyhow, I kept your home spick and span in your absence . while going outside I always confirmed to lock it properly as it was like my own home .
Pay my regards to my uncle and aunt and give my shower of love to your daughter.
